column4: if you've an older model, the wireless is likely supported. there seems to be a six-month lag
you mean that the incompatibility is generaly not definitive and that generally about six months later it becomes compatible?
more or less. i believe the first-generation macbooks have supported wireless now. i'm sure the forums contain more information regarding the status of hardware support
ok I will go check the forum then, I will see what I can find. Thanks anyway
